ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 8
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well Met Asdunn ... It took me quite a few attempts to get anything to work. You ll need a sketch and flask of water.   Some things require different
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Ashley Dunn" <asdunn1@...>

Well Met Asdunn

> I have just started with pottery as a way of using up all the clay I
> find in Beholder.
> I found a pottery wheel but have been unsuccessful in
> doing anything so far. Can someone fill me in on the basics?

It took me quite a few attempts to get anything to work.
You'll need a sketch and flask of water. Some things require different
amounts of clay. Block, Large Block etc...

Review the Archived messages left previously and ask your question
again. I can help give you the formula for some sketches.

Also, the www.gameguides.com - unOfficial Everquest Guide is invaluable tome.

Cleric Taven (Veeshan)
Brotherhood of Balance
